title: ♦SUNNY SPACIOUS DAVIS SQ STUDIO WITH SLEEPING ALCOVE! HEAT INCLUDED!
posting_body: ['SUNNY SPACIOUS DAVIS SQ STUDIO WITH SLEEPING ALCOVE!', 'HEAT INCLUDED!', ' - $1,800 per month', '123 Orchard Street, Somerville, MA 02144', 'FEATURES', 'Bedrooms:', '0', 'Bathrooms:', '1', 'Located on Floor #:', '1', 'Floors in Bldg:', '4', 'Pets Allowed:', 'None', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Located steps to Davis Square within a professionally managed pre-war building, this beautiful sunny spacious studio features refinished hardwood floors, high ceilings, separate kitchen and sleeping alcove!', 'Modern renovated bathroom!', 'Laundry is on the premises.', 'Heat and hot water are included!', 'Available 10/1/2022.', 'RENTAL UNIT AMENITIES', 'Refrigerator', 'Hardwood Floors', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'On-site Laundry', 'OTHER PRICING DETAILS', 'Available Date:   Sat Oct 01, 2022', 'Included Utilities:   Heat & Hot Water', 'CONTACT INFO', 'Roy Seidenberg', '617-628-4663 x100', 'Boston Rental Exchange', 'brex10-ry']
